segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water running full force from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink basin is completely overflowing, pouring water onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a significant puddle right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is probably getting soaked by now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems utterly oblivious to the growing mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't looked down or heard the splashing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her face shows absolutely no reaction whatsoever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the serene garden outside the window is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how unaware she is of the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish someone would tell her to turn off the tap.
segments.speaker: PAR
